trans-unit.source: Do not export the format definition.
trans-unit.target: Betg exportar questa definiziun da formataziun

trans-unit.source: The selector defines to which element(s) the format definition applies.
trans-unit.target: Il selectur definescha per tge element(s) che questa definiziun da formataziun vala.

trans-unit.source: Categories can be used to group format definitions in the back end.
trans-unit.target: Categorias pon vegnir utilisadas per gruppar definiziuns da formataziun en il back-end.

trans-unit.source: Here you can add a comment.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti agiuntar in commentari.

trans-unit.source: Width, height, min-width, min-height, max-width and max-height.
trans-unit.target: Width, height, min-width, min-height, max-width e max-height.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's width.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir la largezza da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's height.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir l'autezza da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's minimum width.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la largezza minimala da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's minimum height.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar l'autezza minimala da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's maximum width.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la largezza maximala da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the element's maximum height.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar l'autezza maximala da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Position, float, clear, overflow and display.
trans-unit.target: Position, float, clear, overflow e display.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left position.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la posiziun sura, a dretga, sut ed a sanestra.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the position type.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il tip da posiziunar

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the float type.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il tip da float.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the clear type.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il tip da clear.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the overflow behaviour.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir il cumportament en cas dad overflow.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the display type.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir il tip da display.

trans-unit.source: Margin, padding, align, vertical-align, text-align and whitespace.
trans-unit.target: Margin, padding, align, vertical-align, text-align e whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left margin.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la distanza dador sura, a dretga, sut ed a sanestra.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left padding.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la distanza dadens sura, a dretga, sut ed a sanestra.

trans-unit.source: To align an element, its left and right margin will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: Per drizzar ora l'element vegn il 'margin' dretg e sanester surscrit.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the vertical alignment.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner l'alingiament vertical

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the horizontal text alignment.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner l'alingiament orizontal dal text.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define how white-space inside an element is handled.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir sco ch'il white-space entaifer in element vegn tract√†.

trans-unit.source: Background-color, background-image, background-position, background-repeat, linear-gradient and box-shadow.
trans-unit.target: Background-color, background-image, background-position, background-repeat, linear-gradient e box-shadow.
Colur dal fund davos e fermezza da cuvrir

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a hexadecimal background color (e.g. ff0000 for red) and an optional opacity in percent (e.g. 75).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina valur hexadecimala per la colur dal fund davos (p. ex. ff0000 per cotschen) sco era opziunal la fermezza da cuvrir en pertschient (p. ex. 75).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the path to a background image.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il decurs ad ina maletg per il fund davos.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the position of the background image.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner la posiziun dal maletg da fund davos.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the repeating mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir sche e co ch'il fund davos duai vegnir repet√¨.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the X and Y offset, an optional blur size and an optional spread radius.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar l'offset en direcziun X ed Y, sco era opziunalmain ina valur per il diffus ed in radios da diffusiun.
Colur ed fermezza da colur da la sumbriva

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a hexadecimal shadow color (e.g. ff0000 for red) and an optional opacity in percent (e.g. 75).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina valur hexadecimala per la colur da la sumbriva (p. ex. ff0000 per cotschen) ed ina fermezza da colur en pertschient (p. ex. 75).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the gradient angle (e.g. 0deg) or the direction (e.g. to bottom or to top right).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar l'angel dal gradient (p. ex. 0deg) ni la direcziun (p. ex. to bottom u to top right).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter up to four colors with an optional percentage (e.g. ffc 10% | f90 | f00).
trans-unit.target: Ti pos endatar enfin quatter colurs cun ina valur en pertschient opziunala (p. ex. ffc 10% | f90 | f00).

trans-unit.source: Border-width, border-style, border-color, border-radius, border-collapse and border-spacing.
trans-unit.target: Border-width, border-style, border-color, border-radius, border-collapse e border-spacing.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left border width.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la largezza da l'ur sura, a dretga, sut ed a sanestra.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the border style.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il stil da l'ur.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a hexadecimal border color (e.g. ff0000 for red) and an optional opacity in percent (e.g. 75).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina valur hexadecimala per la colur da l'ur (p. ex . ff0000 per cotschen) ed ina fermezza da la colur en pertschient (p. ex. 75).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left border radius.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il radius da l'ur sura sanester, sura dretg, sut dretg e sut sanester.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the border handling.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il model da l'ur

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the border spacing.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir la distanza da l'ur

trans-unit.source: Font-family, font-size, font-color, line-height, font-style and white-space.
trans-unit.target: Font-family, font-size, font-color, line-height, font-style e white-space.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of font types.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas cun las scrittiras.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the font size.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la grondezza da la scrittira.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a hexadecimal font color (e.g. ff0000 for red) and an optional opacity in percent (e.g. 75).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina valur hexadecimala per la colur da la scrittira (p. ex . ff0000 per cotschen) ed ina fermezza da la colur en pertschient (p. ex. 75).

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the line height.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir l'autezza da la lingia

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose one or more font styles.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner in u plirs stils per la scrittira

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose a text transformation mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il modus da text-transform.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a text indentation.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir l'incisiun dal text.

trans-unit.source: Here you can modify the letter spacing (default: 0px).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti midar la distanza tranter caracters (standard: 0px).

trans-unit.source: Here you can modify the word spacing (default: 0px).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir la distanza tranter pleds (standard: 0px).

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose a list symbol.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner in simbol da glista

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the path to an individual symbol.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il decurs ad in simbol persunalis√†.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter custom CSS code.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar agen code da CSS
Crear ina nova definiziun da formataziun
Detagls da la definiziun da la formataziun

trans-unit.source: Show the details of format definition ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls da la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Modifitgar la definiziun da la formataziun
Modifitgar la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Spustar la definiziun da la formataziun
Spustar la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Duplitgar la definiziun da la formataziun
Duplitgar la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Stizzar la definiziun da la formataziun
Stizzar la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Encollar suenter la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
Crear sura ina nova definiziun da formataziun

trans-unit.source: Add new after format definition ID %s
trans-unit.target: Crear in nov element suenter la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s

trans-unit.source: Toggle the visibility of format definition ID %s
trans-unit.target: Midar la visibilitad la definiziun da la formataziun cun l'ID %s
